attributes.action: No need for mandatory vaccinations for care home staff with Lancet breakthrough
attributes.background:
1.Care Home workers should not have to have a mandatory Covid vaccination to keep their job.
2. The Health and Social Care Act 2008 section 129-130, paragraph 45E. 
It is infringement of health act, human act and nuremberg code1947

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842
